explanations.reason: The paper focuses on examining the relationship between firms' ESG performance and the quality of internal controls, using audit report lag as a measure of auditor effort. The methodologies employed include random-effect GLS panel regression, generalized linear model, and two-stage least square model, which are traditional statistical and econometric techniques. There is no mention or implication of any machine learning or deep learning techniques, models, or algorithms in the paper's title or abstract.
